name: Pouria Rouzrokh
title: Radiology AI Developer & Researcher | Assistant Research Professor at Mayo Clinic | Diagnostic Radiology Resident at Yale University
bio: I am a researcher focused on applying machine learning and artificial intelligence to solve complex problems in healthcare and biomedical science. My work spans across medical imaging, clinical data analysis, and predictive modeling.
shortBio: AI researcher at the intersection of healthcare and machine learning.
